snippet: A charge of fraud involving 26 articles was leveled by the University of Connecticut against Dipak K. Das, whose work reported health benefits in red wine.
abstract: University of Connecticut charges Dipak K Das with widespread scientific fraud related to 26 articles he published related to his work studying the health benefits of wine; University says it will return two new grants issued to Das that are worth a total of $890,000.
lead_paragraph: A charge of fraud involving 26 articles was leveled by the University of Connecticut against Dipak K. Das, whose work reported health benefits in red wine.

headline.seo: Fraud Charges for Dipak K. Das, a University of Connecticut Researcher
headline.main: University Suspects Fraud by a Researcher Who Studied Red Wine
headline.print_headline: University Suspects Fraud by a Researcher Who Studied Red Wine
